scripts.dev: node scripts/setup-env.js && concurrently "npm run dev -w client" "cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=server/.env ts-node-dev --project server/tsconfig.json --respawn --transpile-only --require dotenv/config server/src/index.ts"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready for deployment'
scripts.start: node scripts/setup-env.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=server/.env node --require dotenv/config server/dist/server/src/index.js
